title: The 1360HP Heart of the Koenigsegg One:1 - Inside Koenigsegg
description: Christian von Koenigsegg explains how his team has developed the new Koenigsegg One:1 5.0-liter twin-turbocharged V8 engine which produces 1,360 hp and 1,371 N·m (1,011 lb·ft) of torque at 6000 rpm.Total weight of the engine is only 197 kg (434 lb) thanks to a carbon fiber intake manifold and the aluminum construction. The transmission is a 7-speed dual clutch with paddle shifters.
tags: Koenigsegg One:1, supercar, worlds fastest car, twin turbo, 5.0L V8, carbon fiber
